name: Okta
description: Search Okta user accounts by email and display account and group information.

options.name: Okta URL
options.description: URL for your Okta instance.  The URL should include the scheme (https://).

options.name: Okta API Token
options.description: API Token required to authorize with Okta.

options.name: Default Domains to Search
options.description: A comma delimited list of domains that will be searched when doing email lookups in Okta. If left blank, all email addresses will be searched.
